summary: Frontend footer ticker UI was updated to consume market data hooks and display loading/error states, but the diff summary does not show the backend implementation required to fetch NSE India prices via HTTP outcalls nor a query method exposing Stock data sourced from nseindia.com.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend support to fetch share prices from the NSE India website (https://www.nseindia.com/) using HTTP outcalls, and expose a query method that returns the latest available stock price data (at minimum: symbol, companyName, ltp, dayClose) for the frontend market ticker.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo shows new Stock-related types and cache variables, but the diff excerpt does not provide evidence of (a) an HTTP outcall to https://www.nseindia.com/, (b) parsing/transforming NSE responses into Stock records, (c) a public query method returning [Stock], or (d) graceful failure handling and caching/throttling logic tied to those outcalls.
